credentials: PHD 2019 Univ of IL at Urbana-Champaign
name: Lillie WILLIAMSON

ratings.comment: Pretty easy class as long as you stay on top of asynchronous work. One in-person lecture and a discussion per week, and the asynchronous lectures are very straight-forward and concise. No exams, just four different writing assignments. Lots of points accumulate over the semester, too. Dr. Williamson is also a great lecturer and very personable!

Dr. Williamson is by far the best professor I've had at this campus so far. She is knowledgeable about her discipline, kind, tries to know people's names, and is excellent at explaining all the concepts: only one weekly lecture and easy online modules. The papers were simple, and the content was interesting. 100% recommend

Easy A with interesting content. Prof Williamson was very nice and cared a ton about what she's teaching, but honestly it was all pretty common-sense stuff. Easy tests and only one paper. If you are interested in healthcare, this is a decent choice.
